title: Verify TUI Support
description: Verify `top` or `vi` works correctly (colors, cursor movement, exit).

title: Integrate Working Directory Configuration
description: Update main.py to accept a --workdir argument and pass it to the ProjectManager.
close_reason: Implemented --workdir argument and updated ProjectManager to use environment variable fallback.

title: Fix Terminal Layout and Support TUI
description:
Address UX issues with the Terminal component: overlapping the AppBar and lack of TUI (inline) support.

Requirements:
1.  **Layout Fix**: The terminal panel must not cover the App Bar. It should sit below it. Also, provide a visible 'Close' button within the panel.
2.  **TUI Support**: Enable support for interactive terminal applications (e.g., `vim`, `htop`) and true inline typing.
    -   Use the `pyte` library (pure Python VT100 emulator) to manage screen state.
    -   Capture keyboard events directly (including arrows, Ctrl keys) and send to the PTY.
    -   Render the terminal screen buffer to the UI instead of appending to a list.

title: Extract AppBar Component
description: Create src/sysengn/ui/components/app_bar.py and refactor main.py to use it.
close_reason: Extracted AppBar component to sysengn.ui.components.app_bar.py and refactored main.py

title: Create ResizeablePanel Component
description: Implement `src/sysengn/ui/components/resizeable_panel.py`. It should use a `Stack` or `Row` (with a `GestureDetector` as the handle) to manage its own width and position on the right side.

title: Verify Terminal Functionality
description: Test running commands like `ls`, `cd`, and `pwd` to verify persistence and output capturing.
close_reason: Terminal functional tests completed. Coverage verified.

title: Create Components Directory and Init
description: Create src/sysengn/ui/components and __init__.py

title: Move Terminal to Right and Make Resizeable
description:
Refactor the Terminal integration to move it to the right side of the screen and allow user resizing.

Requirements:
1.  **Right-Side Placement**: The terminal should appear from the right side (replacing the current left drawer).
2.  **Resizeable Width**: Users must be able to drag the edge of the terminal panel to adjust its width.
3.  **Implementation Strategy**: Replace the standard `page.drawer` with a custom overlay component in `main.py` using a `Stack`. This overlay will contain the terminal and a drag handle.

Tasks:
1.  **Create ResizeablePanel Component**: Build a generic `ResizeableSidePanel` in `src/sysengn/ui/components/resizeable_panel.py` that supports right-side placement and drag-to-resize logic.
2.  **Refactor Main Layout**: Update `main.py` to wrap the application content in a `Stack`. Add the `ResizeableSidePanel` (containing the Terminal) as the top layer.
3.  **Connect AppBar**: Update `main.py` to pass a callback to `SysEngnAppBar` that toggles the visibility of the new panel (removing the old drawer logic).
4.  **Verify**: Test opening, closing, and resizing the terminal.
close_reason: Moved terminal to right-side resizeable panel. Implemented ResizeableSidePanel component, refactored main layout to Stack, and updated AppBar integration.

title: Implement ANSI Color Parsing
description: Update `terminal.py` to parse ANSI escape codes from shell output and render them using Flet's `TextSpan` or compatible rich text controls.
close_reason: Implemented basic ANSI color parsing using regex and Flet TextSpans.

title: Create Terminal UI Component
description: Create `src/sysengn/ui/components/terminal.py`. Implement a Flet control that displays terminal output and accepts user input. Connect it to the `ShellManager`.

title: Verify Enhanced Terminal
description: Test the new drawer placement, color rendering with `ls --color`, and inline typing experience.
close_reason: Verified via unit tests (fixed test_terminal.py to match new UI structure and ANSI parsing) and code review.

title: Enhance Terminal Component
description:
Refactor the Terminal component to improve integration and usability.

Requirements:
1.  **UI Placement**: Move the terminal from a bottom sheet to a full-height left-side Navigation Drawer.
2.  **ANSI Colors**: Parse and render ANSI escape codes (colors, bold) instead of displaying raw characters.
3.  **Inline Interaction**: Refactor the input mechanism to mimic a seamless terminal experience (single window effect) rather than a separated input box.
close_reason: Terminal enhancements complete: moved to full-height left drawer, implemented ANSI color parsing, and refactored for inline interaction.

title: Add Docstrings to UI Components
description: Add Google-style docstrings to src/sysengn/ui/components/app_bar.py and src/sysengn/ui/components/login_view.py to match project standards.

title: Implement Terminal UI Component
description:
Create a resizeable UI component that provides a CLI terminal interface on the local machine.

Requirements:
- Component should be reusable (in `src/sysengn/ui/components/terminal.py`).
- Allow users to type commands and see output.
- Support basic shell interaction (e.g., maintaining working directory state).
- Be resizeable (handled via Flet layout properties).

Tasks:
1.  **Prototype Shell Backend**: Create a mechanism to manage a persistent shell process (using `subprocess` or `pty`) that can receive input and stream output.
2.  **Create TerminalComponent**: Build the Flet UI (Output display + Input field) and connect it to the shell backend.
3.  **Integrate into App**: Add a button (e.g., in the AppBar or a new Tab) to launch the terminal component, ensuring it displays correctly.
4.  **Verify**: Test common commands (`ls`, `pwd`, `cd`) to ensure usability.
close_reason: Implemented terminal feature: ShellManager backend, TerminalComponent UI, integration into AppBar, and verification tests.

title: Update Data Models and Database Schema
description: Add 'path' and 'repo_url' fields to the Project model and update the SQLite schema to support them.

title: Refactor for Inline Terminal Interaction
description: Modify `terminal.py` to merge input and output visually. Ensure typing feels connected to the prompt (e.g., focus management, appended input).

title: Implement File System Integration
description:
The sysengn tool requires file system integration to manage data and projects via git.

Requirements:
- Support a working directory parameter (defaults to current working directory).
- Enforce directory structure: {working_directory}/{user_directory}/{repo_directory}.
- Git integration is core to the workflow.
- Repositories within the user directory represent SysEngn projects.
- Functionality to add new projects by creating or cloning repositories into the user directory.

title: Refactor UI into Reusable Components
description:
Create a /ui/components directory and extract reusable UI elements to improve modularity and maintainability.

Tasks:
1.  Create `src/sysengn/ui/components` directory.
2.  **Extract AppBar Component**:
    -   Create `app_bar.py` in `components`.
    -   Should accept an icon (logo) and a dictionary of tabs ({name: Component}).
    -   Should handle navigation callbacks.
    -   Refactor `build_banner` in `main.py` to use this new component.
3.  **Extract Login Page Component**:
    -   Create `login_page.py` in `components` (or refactor existing `ui/login_screen.py` to be more component-like).
    -   Should accept parameters: `icon`, `oauth_providers` (list/dict), `allow_user_pass` (bool).
    -   Refactor `main.py` and `login_screen.py` to use this parameterized approach.
4.  **Verify**:
    -   Ensure app still launches and navigates correctly.
    -   Run tests and linting.
close_reason: Completed UI refactoring. Extracted AppBar and LoginView components, refactored main.py, and added docstrings.

title: Extract Login Page Component
description: Refactor login screen into a reusable parameterized component in src/sysengn/ui/components/login_view.py

title: Implement VT100 Emulation with pyte
description: Refactor `TerminalComponent` to use `pyte.Screen` and `pyte.Stream`. Feed PTY output to the stream. Render the `screen.display` buffer to a single monospace `Text` control (preformatted) updated efficiently.

title: Update UI for Project Creation
description: Modify the New Project dialog in PMScreen to accept an optional Repository URL and display project paths.

title: Verify Resizeable Terminal
description: Verify the terminal appears on the right and can be resized. Ensure existing functionality (login, tabs) isn't broken by the Stack layout.

title: Connect AppBar to Resizeable Panel
description: Update `app_bar.py` to accept an `on_toggle_terminal` callback instead of creating its own drawer. Update `main.py` to pass this callback which toggles the panel's visibility.
close_reason: Connected AppBar terminal button to toggle ResizeableSidePanel in Stack layout

title: IndexError in get_all_projects after schema update
description: The application crashes on login with IndexError: No item with that key in get_all_projects. This is caused by the local SQLite database missing the 'path' and 'repo_url' columns added in the recent feature update. The code expects these columns to exist.
close_reason: Implemented auto-migration in init_db to add missing columns to existing databases.

title: Implement Direct Keyboard Capture
description: Add a global `on_keyboard_event` handler (or focused control handler) to capture raw keys (including arrows, Ctrl+C) and send them to the shell PTY.

title: Verify UI Refactoring
description: Run tests and linting to ensure no regressions.

title: Fix Terminal Z-Index and Add Close Button
description: Update `main.py` layout so the terminal panel sits below the AppBar (in z-order or layout flow). Add a prominent 'X' close button to the top-right of the `ResizeableSidePanel` or `TerminalComponent`.

title: Integrate Terminal into Main UI
description: Add a 'Terminal' floating action button to the main layout to open the terminal component as a resizeable drawer on the left side of the screen.

title: Implement Shell Backend
description: Create a backend class (e.g., `ShellManager`) that starts a shell process (`bash` or `sh`), reads stdout/stderr asynchronously, and allows writing commands to stdin. It should expose callbacks for new output.
close_reason: Implemented ShellManager with PTY support, verified with test script.

title: Move Terminal to Left Drawer
description: Update `app_bar.py` to open the terminal in a left-side `NavigationDrawer` (full height) instead of a bottom sheet.

title: Install pyte Dependency
description: Add `pyte` to project dependencies via `uv add pyte`.

title: Implement File System and Git Logic
description: Update ProjectManager to handle file system operations: ensuring user directories, initializing git repos, and cloning remote repos.

title: Add Tests and Verify File System Integration
description: Write pytest tests for the new file system and git functionality, and ensure all linting passes.
close_reason: Added tests for git integration and verified with pytest, ruff, and pyright

title: Refactor Main Layout for Custom Overlay
description: Modify `main.py` to use a root `Stack`. The main content (Banner + View) goes in layer 0. The `ResizeablePanel` (containing Terminal) goes in layer 1, aligned to the right.
